item.title: BNP Paribas Exane Initiates Coverage On Chinese EV Makers XPeng, Li Auto With Muted Price Targets
item.description: BNP Paribas Exane has a ‘Neutral’ rating and a $19 price target on XPeng and an ‘Underperform’ rating and an $18 price target on Li Auto.

item.title: Walmart Wins Price Target Hikes From Wall Street, Guggenheim Sees Strength In Consumables

item.title: Trump, Zelenskyy Point To Possible Trilateral Talks On Russia-Ukraine War
item.description: Trump assured that the Russia-Ukraine war would end, but cautioned that he did not have a definitive timeline for when that would be.
